alert.note: Alert for Newberry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:19PM EDT until June 17 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Newberry County in central South Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 619 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Joanna, or 9 miles northwest of Newberry, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Newberry, Newberry College, Newberry County Airport, Silverstreet, Newberry County Detention Center, Bush River Fire Station, Vaughnville, Belfast Wildlife Management Area and Wyses Ferry. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 62 and 72. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
